refnamediv.refpurpose: check a system's clock through TAICLOCK

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: taiclock connects to a TAICLOCK server on host. It communicates using the TAICLOCK protocol. host must be a dotted-decimal IP address.

taiclock prints to its standard output a 16-byte TAI64NA adjustment that, when added to the local UNIX clock, will produce the TAI clock on host. This is suitable for input to programs such as clockadd1 and clockview1.
taiclock limits the adjustment to 2 days.
